name: Pelogos
description:
Pelogos is a game about exploring death, grief, and what lies beyond our current existence. The game covers subjects such as drowning, possession, abusive environments, and survivor's guilt. It is highly recommended that the TTRPG Safety Toolkit Guide by Kienna S. is used while playing Pelogos. The game requires a minimum of two players, with one player operating as the Game Master (GM), known as The Navigator in Pelogos, but there is no maximum number of players.

This version of the game is the ashcan version, meaning it hasn't been edited, playtested, or possess a proper layout. The document will be updated as I have time to work on it, but do let me know what you think!
